> [{quoted}](name=Marcus Phillida,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wee6j0Ep,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2017-05-01T13:02:54.743+0000)
>
> Cause players suck at him.

half of all plat players?

yes lol
Think about it this way. Lee sin is touted as being one of if not the most difficult champs in the game, he has a **40%** playrate, yet he has a 50%+ winrate?
By all means he should have a 45-56% winrate with how insane his playrate is.
{{champion:238}} has a 47% winrate despite being arguably easier to play than lee. When have you heard people crying for zed buffs? he still has a 10%+ playrate and is played successfully by his mains.
{{champion:7}} has a -48% winrate with a -7% playrate, yet no ones doubts that she is strong in the right hands.

Lee having a 50% winrate with a freaking 40% playrates is a very good sign that he is in need of some nerfs. That many people should not have that much success with a supposedly "difficult" champion.
Bad players... his only weakness...

Lee Sin's failures are due to PEBCAK errors.

Problem Exists Between Chair and Keyboard.

When Lee Sin fails, it's a PICNIC.

(Problem In Chair, Not In ~~Computer~~ Champion)
I think this one suits because Lees usually camp
How come I didn't think of it. Damnit.

And Janna. 

Her feet never touch the ground so he can't hear her footsteps.

Meaning he can't see her.
She's actually a really heavy mouth breather so it's ok...
